languages.text: "Как думаете, надолго он{rt_mf||а} у нас? А если останется... а если новым губернатором?! Это пока он{rt_mf||а} наших господ строит, а коли и за нас потом возьмется? Ох, кровь святых, спасите и сохраните..."

traits.locale_text: "Как думаете, надолго он{mf||а} у нас? А если останется... а если новым губернатором?! Ох, кровь святых, спасите и сохраните..."

languages.text: "How long do you think {rt_mf|he|she}'ll be staying here? What if {rt_mf|he|she} never leaves? What if {rt_mf|he|she} becomes our new governor? For now, {rt_mf|he|she}'s putting our lords and ladies in their places, but what if we're next? Oh, saints' blood, may He protect us..."
languages.original_text: "Как думаете, надолго он{rt_mf||а} у нас? А если останется... а если новым губернатором?! Это пока он{rt_mf||а} наших господ строит, а коли и за нас потом возьмется? Ох, кровь святых, спасите и сохраните..."

traits.locale_text: "How long do you think {rt_mf|he'll|she'll} be staying here? What if {rt_mf|he|she} never leaves? What if {rt_mf|he|she} becomes our new governor? For now, {rt_mf|he's|she's} putting our lords and ladies in their places, but what if we're next? Oh, saints' blood, may He protect us..."

"How long do you think {rt_mf|he'll|she'll} be staying here? What if {rt_mf|he|she} never leaves? What if {rt_mf|he|she} becomes our new governor? For now, {rt_mf|he's|she's} putting our lords and ladies in their places, but what if we're next? Oh, saints' blood, may He protect us..."

"How long do you think {rt_mf|he'll|she'll} be staying here? What if {rt_mf|he|she} never leaves? What if {rt_mf|he|she} becomes our new governor? For now, {rt_mf|he's|she's} putting our lords and ladies in their places, but what if we're next? Oh, saints' blood, may He protect us..."

"How long do you think {rt_mf|he|she}'ll be staying here? What if {rt_mf|he|she} never leaves? What if {rt_mf|he|she} becomes our new governor? For now, {rt_mf|he|she}'s putting our lords and ladies in their places, but what if we're next? Oh, saints' blood, may He protect us..."

"How long do you think {rt_mf|he|she}'ll be staying here? What if {rt_mf|he|she} never leaves? What if {rt_mf|he|she} becomes our new governor? For now, {rt_mf|he|she}'s putting our lords and ladies in their places, but what if we're next? Oh, saints' blood, may He protect us..."

languages.text: “你们觉得，{rt_mf|他|她}还会在这里待多久？万一{rt_mf|他|她}再也不想走了呢？万一{rt_mf|他|她}成了我们的新总督呢？{rt_mf|他|她}确实把那些老爷太太们驯得服服帖帖的，可万一接下来轮到咱们，那该怎么办？噢，圣人之血在上，愿帝皇保佑我们……”
languages.original_text: "How long do you think {rt_mf|he|she}'ll be staying here? What if {rt_mf|he|she} never leaves? What if {rt_mf|he|she} becomes our new governor? For now, {rt_mf|he|she}'s putting our lords and ladies in their places, but what if we're next? Oh, saints' blood, may He protect us..."

traits.locale_text: “你们觉得，{rt_mf|他|她}还会在这里待多久？万一{rt_mf|他|她}再也不想走了呢？万一{rt_mf|他|她}成了我们的新总督呢？{rt_mf|他|她}确实把那些老爷太太们驯得服服帖帖的，可万一接下来轮到咱们，那该怎么办？噢，圣人之血在上，愿帝皇保佑我们……”

languages.text: «¿Cuánto tiempo crees que estará por aquí? ¿Y si nunca se va? ¿Y si es nuestr{rt_mf|o próximo gobernador|a próxima gobernadora}? Por ahora, está poniendo en su lugar a nuestros nobles, pero ¿y si nosotros somos los siguientes? Por la sangre de los santos, que Él nos guarde...».
languages.original_text: "How long do you think {rt_mf|he|she}'ll be staying here? What if {rt_mf|he|she} never leaves? What if {rt_mf|he|she} becomes our new governor? For now, {rt_mf|he|she}'s putting our lords and ladies in their places, but what if we're next? Oh, saints' blood, may He protect us..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cuánto tiempo crees que estará por aquí? ¿Y si nunca se va? ¿Y si es nuestr{rt_mf|o próximo gobernador|a próxima gobernadora}? Por ahora, está poniendo en su lugar a nuestros nobles, pero ¿y si nosotros somos los siguientes? Por la sangre de los santos, que Él nos guarde...».

languages.text: "Sence burada ne kadar kalacak? Ya hiç gitmezse? Ya yeni valimiz olursa? Şimdilik lordlarımızı ve leydilerimizi hizaya sokuyor ama ya sırada biz varsak? Azizlerin kanı aşkına... O bizi korusun..."
languages.original_text: "How long do you think {rt_mf|he|she}'ll be staying here? What if {rt_mf|he|she} never leaves? What if {rt_mf|he|she} becomes our new governor? For now, {rt_mf|he|she}'s putting our lords and ladies in their places, but what if we're next? Oh, saints' blood, may He protect us..."

traits.locale_text: "Sence burada ne kadar kalacak? Ya hiç gitmezse? Ya yeni valimiz olursa? Şimdilik lordlarımızı ve leydilerimizi hizaya sokuyor ama ya sırada biz varsak? Azizlerin kanı aşkına... O bizi korusun..."
"Sence burada ne kadar kalacak? Ya hiç gitmezse? Ya yeni valimiz olursa? Ya soylularımız onun zevklerini ve tavırlarını benimserse? Azizlerin kanı aşkına... O bizi korusun..."

languages.text: 「あの方はどれくらいここに滞在すると思う？もしここを去らずに、新たな総督にでもなったら？今は領主や貴族たちに分をわきまえさせてるようだけれど…次は俺たちの番なんじゃ？あぁ、聖なる血よ、陛下が俺たちをお守りくださいますように…」
languages.original_text: "How long do you think {rt_mf|he|she}'ll be staying here? What if {rt_mf|he|she} never leaves? What if {rt_mf|he|she} becomes our new governor? For now, {rt_mf|he|she}'s putting our lords and ladies in their places, but what if we're next? Oh, saints' blood, may He protect us..."

traits.locale_text: 「あの方はどれくらいここに滞在すると思う？もしここを去らずに、新たな総督にでもなったら？今は領主や貴族たちに分をわきまえさせてるようだけれど…次は俺たちの番なんじゃ？あぁ、聖なる血よ、陛下が俺たちをお守りくださいますように…」

languages.text: « Combien de temps {rt_mf|il|elle} va rester ici, à ton avis ? Et {rt_mf|s'il|si elle} ne partait plus jamais ? Et {rt_mf|s'il|si elle} devenait notre {rt_mf|gouverneur|gouverneure} ? Pour le moment, {rt_mf|il|elle} remets nos dames et nos seigneurs à leur place, mais notre tour pourrait venir ensuite. Oh, par le sang des saints, que l'Empereur nous protège... »
languages.original_text: "How long do you think {rt_mf|he|she}'ll be staying here? What if {rt_mf|he|she} never leaves? What if {rt_mf|he|she} becomes our new governor? For now, {rt_mf|he|she}'s putting our lords and ladies in their places, but what if we're next? Oh, saints' blood, may He protect us..."

traits.locale_text: « Combien de temps {rt_mf|il|elle} va rester ici, à ton avis ? Et {rt_mf|s'il|si elle} ne partait plus jamais ? Et {rt_mf|s'il|si elle} devenait notre {rt_mf|gouverneur|gouverneure} ? Pour le moment, {rt_mf|il|elle} remets nos dames et nos seigneurs à leur place, mais notre tour pourrait venir ensuite. Oh, par le sang des saints, que l'Empereur nous protège... »

languages.text: "Wie lange wird {rt_mf|er|sie} wohl bleiben? Was ist, wenn {rt_mf|er|sie} gar nicht mehr geht? Was ist, wenn {rt_mf|er unser neuer Gouverneur|unsere neue Gouverneurin} wird? Im Moment weist {rt_mf|er|sie} unsere Lords und Ladys in die Schranken, aber was, wenn wir die Nächsten sind? Oh, beim Blut der Heiligen, möge Er uns beschützen ..."
languages.original_text: "How long do you think {rt_mf|he|she}'ll be staying here? What if {rt_mf|he|she} never leaves? What if {rt_mf|he|she} becomes our new governor? For now, {rt_mf|he|she}'s putting our lords and ladies in their places, but what if we're next? Oh, saints' blood, may He protect us..."

traits.locale_text: "Wie lange wird {mf|er|sie} wohl bleiben? Was ist, wenn {mf|er|sie} gar nicht mehr geht? Was ist, wenn {rt_mf|er unser neuer Gouverneur|unsere neue Gouverneurin} wird? Im Moment weist {mf|er|sie} unsere Lords und Ladys in die Schranken, aber was, wenn wir die Nächsten sind? Oh, beim Blut der Heiligen, möge Er uns beschützen ..."
